column4: A space with a stage and audience seating to accommodate performing arts or other activities for a large audience.
A space for actors and actresses to use before and during performances.
A space adjacent to the auditorium and equipped with a viewing area and built-in projection equipment.
A space that provides temporary shelter for individuals whose residences have been made uninhabitable by fire, flood, earthquake, or other major disaster.
A space with a stage and movable chairs designed for assemblies, but also usable for other purposes.
Other is specified as an area designed primarily for theater productions, assemblies, and other large gatherings.
